name: Turn Based Prototype (JustDamo)
description:
The only control is left click to push buttons.

This was my first solo project that I scripted. I'm mostly posting this one as a gentle reminder to myself that I can look back to one day and say "That's the first little game I made." 

It was made with the idea of "What if abilities combo'ed into each other for cool effects?" and this ended up mostly being one big combo of three abilities, Poison Dart (Lasts a few turns, does damage during the enemies turn), Timed Earth (Does extra damage if enemy is frozen, doesn't do damage until after a turn has passed), Freeze Ray (Stuns the enemy, works with Timed Earth).
